Description: Tolerance for the NS residual, below which the solver exits
Exponential CFL ramping, from initial to final, over _rampSteps_ steps
Kappa for the MUSCL scheme, range from [-1, 1], with 1 being unstable.
Time step at which to start enforcing maxDtStep. Default of -1 does not enforce a max time step.
Frequency at which the jacobian is updated.
Frequency at which to update the NS equation in loosely-coupled simulations
Scales the wave speed acording to a viscous flux. 0.0 is no speed correction, with larger values providing a larger viscous wave speed correction.
